metadata.name: new-era (autoportrait)
metadata.description:
This piece represents me in a digital and urban universe. My sword represents music as an emotional weapon. Itâ€™s connected to a headset that sends the user back into his deepest dreams. The chain is Vivian Westwood and the shoes are a pair of Gucci flash trek sega with a removable crystal. Lastly, the colors represent emotions that are open to interpretation.

new-era (autoportrait) is the first piece of the "NEW-ERA" collection. The rest of the collection will coming soon. <3
